titleStmt.title: The Sad and lamentable condition of the Protestants in Ireland being an account of the barbarous proceedings of the natives against the English : as also of the facility of rescuing those distressed Protestants out of the hands of the bloody papists, provided there be a speedy supply from England.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by Randal Taylor ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
